actions.name: Jaw Lock
actions.description:
Effect: The user auto-succeeds on a @Affliction[grapple] Maneuver check against the target if Jaw Lock hits. The Target becomes @Affliction[bound] 5. While the target is @Affliction[bound], they cannot be switched out and cannot flee.

If either the @Affliction[grapple] or @Affliction[bound] condition ends, the target loses the other condition.
